mtd.model.command

Class QuizMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • mtd.model.command.QuizMaster

  • public class QuizMaster
extends Object
    Acts as Model, within the MVC structure. Stores, gives, loads game data.
    Author:
    Jack Sheridan
    See Also:
    Quiz

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuizMaster()
      Creates a new QuizMaster object and instantiates QuizCreator, ScoreTracker Quiz members.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QuizMaster

        public QuizMaster()
        Creates a new QuizMaster object and instantiates QuizCreator, ScoreTracker Quiz members. Also sets a reference to the current question.

      • getSpecifiedQuestion

        public Question getSpecifiedQuestion(GUICommand guicmd)
        Returns a Question object based on the command given (current, next).
        Parameters:
        guicmd - GUICommand which specifies the question to return. At the point of return, the question returned is now QuizMaster.currentQuestion
        Returns:
        Question The specified question.
        See Also:
        GUICommand

      • buildNewQuiz

        public void buildNewQuiz()
        Fetches a new Quiz object using this class's QuizCreator and sets the new Quiz object ready for use.
        See Also:
        Quiz, QuizCreator
